forum.name: guide
forum.description: the anyland guide with faq, frequently asked questions and their answers! help along, wiki style!

thread.title: replacing boards without clicking buttons

comments.text: when on a forum you can hit ctrl+m to get to its "..." settings, useful to replace a custom board fundament...
... in case it blocks the view to that "..." button, not allowing manual tapping!

thread.latestCommentText: ... in case it blocks the view to that "..." button, not allowing manual tapping!
